news1: ⭐ Adani Enterprises withdraws its FPO : Adani Enterprises has decided to withdraw its fully subscribed ₹20,000 crore follow-on public offer (FPO). The move comes following unprecedented volatility in the company's shares. The FPO proceeds received from investors will be refunded.
news2: ⭐ Britannia reports robust numbers : Britannia Industries has reported a 151% YoY increase in consolidated net profit to ₹932 crore, while its sales grew by 16% YoY to ₹4,101 crore for the December quarter. As per the company, consistent rise in market share, investments in brands and innovation have helped register robust growth.
news3: ⭐ Strong monthly sales for auto cos : Market leader, Maruti Suzuki’s domestic passenger vehicle (PV) sales for January increased 13% YoY to 1.7 lakh units. The company cited that a shortage of electronic components has a minor impact on production. Meanwhile, Tata Motors’ PV sales rose 18% YoY to 48,289 units. SUV maker Mahindra & Mahindra, too, reported a 66% rise in its PV sales.
